<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Locations </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Strings </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr3</name>=<value> Structured Text </value></part><part><name>GROUP3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Creates a structured text containing the given plain text if argument is [[String]]. Use [[setAttributes]] to set additional [[Structured_Text#Attributes | attributes]] on the text. If the argument is [[location]], returns location's text value (see Alt Syntax).  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>'''text''' string </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> string: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Structured Text]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> '''text''' location </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> location: [[Location]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_stxt2 = [[text]] "Hello world.";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_townName = [[text]] myTownLocation;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_loc = [[text]] [[nearestLocation]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[position]] [[player]], "NameMarine"]; //"Marina Bay"</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________
